positive_examples: This is an example of quartz.
We observed quartz in this context.
A typical case of quartz would involve these features.
The concept of quartz applies here.
A hard crystalline mineral composed of silicon dioxide, commonly found in igneous and metamorphic rocks.
negative_examples: This is an example of snowflake, not quartz.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Snowflake, or other types of Crystal

definition: A hard crystalline mineral composed of silicon dioxide, common in Earth's crust.
